name: Hello Jello (David T)
description:
You are a jelly trying to survive rising lava and falling blocks. 

You can check the the code in here: https://github.com/DavidT005/Hello-Jello

This game is based on the flash game Avalanche by BeastGames.

The background and music were made by trixelized and svl on itch.io, take a look at their work!
